response.overview: Through a collage of dialogue with various generations of Kosovo Albanians, director traces the story of the iconic Palace of Youth and Sports in Prishtina, formerly known as Sports and Culture Centre „Boro and Ramiz“. This monumental building sits at the intersection between the history of former Yugoslavia and the creation of new national identity, acting as a lens to consider complex issues related to collective / personal memory and visions for the future.
response.title: The Hall
